radiographic_examinations.findings: Opacities have slightly worsened in the axillary portion of the right lung and also in the right lower lobe, concerning for pneumonia in these areas. There is asymmetric pulmonary edema which has improved in the left lung but has worsened in the right lung. The cardiomediastinal silhouette remains stable. There may be trace bilateral pleural effusions. There is no pneumothorax.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: There is worsening of opacities in the right lung areas and worsening pulmonary edema in the right lung, while the left lung has shown improvement.
